item.title: Speed bump issue, 11th July
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping, 11th July
item.description:
Thank you for removing the rubbish bag from Mayplace Lane. There is another still within the tumulus, spilled and very smelly. Please can this too be removed? Also the rubbish next to the salt bin on Eglinton Hill also pictured . Thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayplace Lane, Shooters Hill, London

item.title: Structure crumbling along f/path nr A2 Wellan Close, Sidcup, 11th July
item.description:
Structure crumbling along f/path nr A2 Wellan Close, Sidcup. caller says there is a brick built structure which runs along footpath along the A2 in between Wellan Close and Westwood Lane which is crumbling. Both TFL & Thames Water have said this the responsibility of the local council
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 308, Westwood Lane, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary lights, 11th July
item.description:
Is there any reason these lights have been erected for a week now and not one person has been seen working on the location? With the temporary lights further up the road by the library it causes backlogs. It’s a relatively small pot hole so shouldn’t take this long
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights
